bioconda.name: multiz
bioconda.summary: DNA multiple sequence aligner from Penn State's Miller lab.

biocontainers.name: multiz
biocontainers.summary: DNA multiple sequence aligner from Penn State's Miller lab.

biotools.summary: Computer program which builds a threaded blockset under the assumption that all matching segments occur in the same order and orientation in the given sequences; inversions and duplications are not addressed.

bioschemas.name: Multiz
bioschemas.summary: Computer program which builds a threaded blockset under the assumption that all matching segments occur in the same order and orientation in the given sequences; inversions and duplications are not addressed.
